ability.name: Adaptability
ability.description: Boosts the same type attack bonus from 1.5x to 2x.

ability.name: Aftermath
ability.description: Damages the attacker after being knocked out.

ability.name: Air Lock
ability.description: Eliminates the effects of weather.

ability.name: Analytic
ability.description: Boosts move power by 30% when the Pokémon moves last.

ability.name: Anger Point
ability.description: Maxes the Attack stat after the Pokémon takes a critical hit.

ability.name: Anticipation
ability.description: Senses an opposing Pokémon's super effective moves.

ability.name: Arena Trap
ability.description: Prevents the foe from fleeing.

ability.name: Bad Dreams
ability.description: At the end of each turn, sleeping opponent take 1/8 of its maximum HP in damage.

ability.name: Battle Armor
ability.description: This Pokémon is protected against critical hits.

ability.name: Big Pecks
ability.description: Protects this Pokémon from Defense-lowering attacks.

ability.name: Blaze
ability.description: Powers up Fire type moves by 50% when this Pokémon's HP is at a third or lower.

ability.name: Chlorophyll
ability.description: Doubles this Pokémon's Speed in harsh sunlight.

ability.name: Clear Body
ability.description: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stats.

ability.name: Cloud Nine
ability.description: Eliminates the effects of weather.

ability.name: Color Change
ability.description: The Pokémon's type becomes the type of the move used on it.

ability.name: Compound Eyes
ability.description: This Pokémon's accuracy is boosted by 1.3x. While leading the party, wild Pokémon hold items more often.

ability.name: Contrary
ability.description: Makes stat changes have an opposite effect.

ability.name: Cursed Body
ability.description: When hit by a contact move, there is a 30% chance the opponent will unable to use that move for 4 turns.

ability.name: Cute Charm
ability.description: When hit by a contact move, there is a 30% chance the opponent will be infatuated if the opponent is the opposite gender.

ability.name: Damp
ability.description: Prevents the use of self-destructing moves.

ability.name: Defeatist
ability.description: Halves this Pokémon's Attack and Special Attack when below half HP.

ability.name: Defiant
ability.description: Boosts this Pokémon's Attack stat by two stages when its stats are lowered.

ability.name: Download
ability.description: Raises either the Attack stat or Special Attack stat by one stage depending on the foe's lowest current defensive stat.

ability.name: Drizzle
ability.description: This Pokémon summons rain when it enters a battle.

ability.name: Drought
ability.description: This Pokémon summons harsh sunlight when it enters a battle.

ability.name: Dry Skin
ability.description: Restores HP in rain or when hit by Water-type moves. Reduces HP in harsh sunlight, and increases the damage received from Fire-type moves.

ability.name: Early Bird
ability.description: This Pokémon wakes up twice as fast.

ability.name: Effect Spore
ability.description: When hit by a contact move, there is a 30% the opponent will be poisoned, paralyzed, or put to sleep.

ability.name: Filter
ability.description: Reduces damage from supereffective attacks by 25%.

ability.name: Flame Body
ability.description: When hit by a contact move, there is a 30% chance the opponent will be burned.

ability.name: Flare Boost
ability.description: Boosts the power of special moves by 50% if this Pokémon is burned.

ability.name: Flash Fire
ability.description: Powers up the Pokémon's Fire type moves if it's hit by one, instead of taking damage.

ability.name: Flower Gift
ability.description: Boosts the Attack and Sp. Def stats by 1/5x of itself and allies in harsh sunlight.

ability.name: Forecast
ability.description: This Pokémon transforms with the weather to change its type to Water, Fire, or Ice.

ability.name: Forewarn
ability.description: Reveals the opponet's most powerful move.

ability.name: Friend Guard
ability.description: Reduces damage done to allies by 25%.

ability.name: Frisk
ability.description: This Pokémon can check a foe's held item.

ability.name: Gluttony
ability.description: Makes this Pokémon eat a held Berry when its HP drops to half or less.

ability.name: Guts
ability.description: Boosts the Attack stat by 50% if this Pokémon has a status condition. Burns do not lower the Attack stat.

ability.name: Harvest
ability.description: After using a Berry, there is a 50% chance at the end of each turn it will create a new Berry, and is guaranteed in harsh sunlight.

ability.name: Healer
ability.description: At the end of each turn, there is a 30% chance of curing an ally's status condition.

ability.name: Heatproof
ability.description: Halves the damage from Fire type moves.

ability.name: Heavy Metal
ability.description: Doubles this Pokémon's weight.

ability.name: Honey Gather
ability.description: This Pokémon may gather Honey after a battle.

ability.name: Huge Power
ability.description: Doubles this Pokémon's Attack stat.

ability.name: Hustle
ability.description: Boosts the Attack stat by 50%, but lowers accuracy by 20%.

ability.name: Hydration
ability.description: Heals status problems if it is raining.

ability.name: Hyper Cutter
ability.description: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering its Attack stat.

ability.name: Ice Body
ability.description: This Pokémon regains HP 1/16th of its max HP per turn in hail, and takes no damage from hailstorms.

ability.name: Illuminate
ability.description: Doubles the likelihood of meeting wild Pokémon while leading the party.

ability.name: Illusion
ability.description: Comes out disguised as the Pokémon in the party's last spot, and loses the illusion when hit.

ability.name: Immunity
ability.description: Prevents this Pokémon from getting poisoned.

ability.name: Imposter
ability.description: This Pokémon transforms itself into the Pokémon it's facing.

ability.name: Infiltrator
ability.description: Ignores the effects of a target's Reflect, Light Screen, Safeguard, and Mist.

ability.name: Inner Focus
ability.description: The Pokémon is protected from flinching.

ability.name: Insomnia
ability.description: Prevents this Pokémon from falling asleep.

ability.name: Intimidate
ability.description: Lowers the opposing Pokémon's Attack stat by one stage upon entering battle.

ability.name: Iron Barbs
ability.description: When hit by a contact move, the opponent takes 1/8th of its max HP in damage.

ability.name: Iron Fist
ability.description: Boosts the power of punching moves by 20%.

ability.name: Justified
ability.description: Boosts the Attack stat by one stage when it's hit by a Dark type move.

ability.name: Keen Eye
ability.description: Prevent other Pokémon from lowering this Pokémon's accuracy.

ability.name: Klutz
ability.description: This Pokémon can't use any held items.

ability.name: Leaf Guard
ability.description: Prevents status conditions in harsh sunshine weather.

ability.name: Levitate
ability.description: Gives full immunity to all Ground-type moves.

ability.name: Light Metal
ability.description: Halves this Pokémon's weight.

ability.name: Lightning Rod
ability.description: This Pokémon draws in all Electric-type moves. Instead of being hit by Electric-type moves, it boosts its Sp. Atk.

ability.name: Limber
ability.description: The Pokémon is protected from paralysis.

ability.name: Liquid Ooze
ability.description: Damages attackers using any draining move.

ability.name: Magic Bounce
ability.description: Reflects status moves, instead of getting hit by them.

ability.name: Magic Guard
ability.description: The Pokémon only takes damage from attacks.

ability.name: Magma Armor
ability.description: Prevents the Pokémon from becoming frozen.

ability.name: Magnet Pull
ability.description: Prevents Steel type Pokémon from escaping.

ability.name: Marvel Scale
ability.description: Boosts the Defense stat by 50% if this Pokémon has a status condition.

ability.name: Minus
ability.description: Boosts Sp. Atk by 50% if an ally Pokémon has Plus or Minus.

ability.name: Mold Breaker
ability.description: Moves can be used regardless of Abilities.

ability.name: Moody
ability.description: Raises one stat by two stages and lowers another by one every turn.

ability.name: Motor Drive
ability.description: Boosts its Speed stat if hit by an Electric-type move, instead of taking damage.

ability.name: Moxie
ability.description: Boosts the Attack stat by one stage after knocking out any Pokémon.

ability.name: Multiscale
ability.description: This Pokémon takes half damage while its HP is full.

ability.name: Multitype
ability.description: Changes this Pokémon's type to match the Plate it holds.

ability.name: Mummy
ability.description: When hit by a contact move, the opponent gains Mummy as its ability.

ability.name: Natural Cure
ability.description: All status problems heal when it switches out.

ability.name: No Guard
ability.description: Ensures attacks by or against this Pokémon land.

ability.name: Normalize
ability.description: All of this Pokémon's moves become the Normal type.

ability.name: Overcoat
ability.description: Protects this Pokémon from damage from weather.

ability.name: Overgrow
ability.description: Powers up Grass type moves by 50% when this Pokémon's HP is at a third or lower.

ability.name: Own Tempo
ability.description: Prevents this Pokémon from becoming confused.

ability.name: Pickpocket
ability.description: When hit by a contact move, this Pokémon will steal the opponent's item.

ability.name: Pickup
ability.description: This Pokémon may pick up the item an opposing Pokémon used during a battle. It may pick up items outside of battle, too.

ability.name: Plus
ability.description: Boosts Sp. Atk by 50% if an ally Pokémon has Plus or Minus.

ability.name: Poison Heal
ability.description: Restores HP by 1/8th per turn if this Pokémon is poisoned.

ability.name: Poison Point
ability.description: When hit by a contact move, there is a 30% chance the opponent will be poisoned.

ability.name: Poison Touch
ability.description: When landing a contact move, there is a 30% chance the opponent will be poisoned.

ability.name: Prankster
ability.description: Gives priority to status moves.

ability.name: Pressure
ability.description: This Pokémon raises the foe's PP usage.

ability.name: Pure Power
ability.description: Doubles this Pokémon's Attack stat.

ability.name: Quick Feet
ability.description: Boosts the Speed stat by 50% if this Pokémon has a status condition. Paralysis does not lower the Speed stat.

ability.name: Rain Dish
ability.description: This Pokémon regains HP 1/16th of its max HP per turn in rain.

ability.name: Rattled
ability.description: When hit by Dark, Ghost, or Bug type moves, this Pokémon's Speed stat raises by one stage.

ability.name: Reckless
ability.description: Powers up moves that have recoil damage by 20%.

ability.name: Regenerator
ability.description: Restores a 1/3rd of its max HP when withdrawn from battle.

ability.name: Rivalry
ability.description: Deals 25% more damage to Pokémon of the same gender, but deals 25% less to Pokémon of the opposite gender.

ability.name: Rock Head
ability.description: Protects this Pokémon from recoil damage.

ability.name: Rough Skin
ability.description: When hit by a contact move, the opponent takes 1/16th of its max HP in damage.

ability.name: Run Away
ability.description: Enables a sure getaway from wild Pokémon.

ability.name: Sand Force
ability.description: Boosts the power of Rock, Ground, and Steel type moves by 30% in a sandstorm.

ability.name: Sand Rush
ability.description: Doubles this Pokémon's Speed in a sandstorm.

ability.name: Sand Stream
ability.description: This Pokémon summons a sandstorm in battle.

ability.name: Sand Veil
ability.description: Boosts the Pokémon's evasion in a sandstorm by 20%, and take no damage from sandstorms.

ability.name: Sap Sipper
ability.description: Boosts the Attack stat if hit by a Grass type move, instead of taking damage.

ability.name: Scrappy
ability.description: Makes Normal and Fighting type moves hit Ghost type Pokémon.

ability.name: Serene Grace
ability.description: Doubles the chances of a move's secondary effect to occur.

ability.name: Shadow Tag
ability.description: Prevents the foe from escaping.

ability.name: Shed Skin
ability.description: At the end of each turn, this Pokémon has a 1/3 chance of curing its status condition.

ability.name: Sheer Force
ability.description: Removes the secondary effects of moves, and boosts the power of those moves by 30%.

ability.name: Sheild Dust
ability.description: Blocks the secondary effects of attacks taken.

ability.name: Shell Armor
ability.description: This Pokémon is protected against critical hits.

ability.name: Simple
ability.description: The stat changes the Pokémon receives are doubled.

ability.name: Skill Link
ability.description: Maximizes the number of times multi-strike moves hit.

ability.name: Slow Start
ability.description: For five turns, the Pokémon's Attack and Speed stats are halved.

ability.name: Sniper
ability.description: Boosts the power of critical hits by 1.5x.

ability.name: Snow Cloak
ability.description: Boosts the Pokémon's evasion in a hailstorm by 20%, and take no damage from hailstorms.

ability.name: Snow Warning
ability.description: This Pokémon summons a hailstorm when it enters a battle.

ability.name: Solar Power
ability.description: Boosts the Special Attack stat by 1.5x in harsh sunlight, but takes 1/8 of its maximum HP at the end of each turn.

ability.name: Solid Rock
ability.description: Reduces damage from supereffective attacks by 25%.

ability.name: Soundproof
ability.description: Gives full immunity to all sound based moves.

ability.name: Speed Boost
ability.description: At the end of each turn, this Pokémon's Speed is raised by one stage.

ability.name: Stall
ability.description: This Pokémon moves after all other Pokémon do.

ability.name: Static
ability.description: When hit by a contact move, there is a 30% chance the opponent will be paralyzed.

ability.name: Steadfast
ability.description: Raises Speed by one stage each time this Pokémon flinches.

ability.name: Stench
ability.description: This Pokémon has a 10% chance of making the target flinch when hit by a damaging move.

ability.name: Sticky Hold
ability.description: Protects this Pokémon from item theft.

ability.name: Storm Drain
ability.description: Draws in all Water-type moves. Instead of being hit by Water-type moves, it boosts its Sp. Atk.

ability.name: Sturdy
ability.description: This Pokémon cannot be knocked out with one hit.

ability.name: Suction Cups
ability.description: Negates all moves that force switching out.

ability.name: Super Luck
ability.description: Boosts the critical-hit ratios of moves by 1 stage.

ability.name: Swarm
ability.description: Powers up Bug type moves by 50% when this Pokémon's HP is at a third or lower.

ability.name: Swift Swim
ability.description: Doubles this Pokémon's Speed in rain.

ability.name: Synchronize
ability.description: Passes a burn, poison, or paralysis to the foe.

ability.name: Tangled Feet
ability.description: This Pokémon half as likely to get hit while confused.

ability.name: Technician
ability.description: Increases the power of moves with 60 or less power by 50%.

ability.name: Telepathy
ability.description: Anticipates an ally's attack and dodges it.

ability.name: Teravolt
ability.description: Moves can be used regardless of Abilities.

ability.name: Thick Fat
ability.description: Halves the damage taken from Fire and Ice type moves.

ability.name: Tinted Lens
ability.description: Doubles the power of "not very effective" moves.

ability.name: Torrent
ability.description: Powers up Water type moves by 50% when this Pokémon's HP is at a third or lower.

ability.name: Toxic Boost
ability.description: Boosts the power of physical moves by 50% if this Pokémon is poisoned.

ability.name: Trace
ability.description: When it enters a battle, this Pokémon copies an opposing Pokémon's Ability.

ability.name: Truant
ability.description: This Pokémon moves only every two turns.

ability.name: Turboblaze
ability.description: Moves can be used regardless of Abilities.

ability.name: Unaware
ability.description: Ignores the opposing Pokémon's stat changes.

ability.name: Unburden
ability.description: Doubles the Speed stat if its held item is used or lost.

ability.name: Unnerve
ability.description: Makes the foe unable to eat Berries.

ability.name: Victory Star
ability.description: Boosts the accuracy of its allies and itself by 10%.

ability.name: Vital Spirit
ability.description: Prevents this Pokémon from falling asleep.

ability.name: Water Veil
ability.description: Prevents the Pokémon from getting a burn.

ability.name: Weak Armor
ability.description: Physical attacks lower this Pokémon's Defense by one stage and raises Speed by one stage.

ability.name: White Smoke
ability.description: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stats.

ability.name: Wonder Guard
ability.description: Only super effective moves will hit this Pokémon.

ability.name: Wonder Skin
ability.description: Lowers the accuracy of status moves used against this Pokémon to 50%.

ability.name: Zen Mode
ability.description: Changes this Pokémon's form when HP is half or less.
